document.full_text: discussions are under way on the possible direct involvement of arab nations in any international military action against libyan leader muammar gaddafi, u.s. secretary of state hillary clinton said on thursday.
document.title: arab role in libya intervention discussed: clinton
lines_and_colors: discussions are under way on the possible direct involvement of arab nations in any international military action against libyan leader muammar gaddafi, u.s. secretary of state hillary clinton said on thursday.
